entities.name: the riddle house
entities.description: The Riddle House is described as a manor that stands on a hill overlooking the village. It has boarded windows, missing tiles from its roof, and ivy spreading over its face.

entities.name: little hangleton
entities.description: Little Hangleton is described as a village where the Riddle House is located.

entities.name: the riddle family
entities.description: The Riddle family is mentioned as having lived in the Riddle House.

relationships.description: The Riddle House is located in Little Hangleton.
The Riddle family resided in the Riddle House.
